content: If you have problems accessing this {{productName}}, please contact the administrator.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when users encounter difficulties accessing the product. It will be shown in a dialog box with the option to recover access, prompting users to contact the administrator for assistance. The message includes placeholders for the product name and registration email.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "هذا" (this) is unnecessary and slightly awkward in this context. It doesn't add meaning and disrupts the flow. Removing it makes the Arabic more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: إذا كنت تواجه مشكلات في الوصول إلى {{productName}}، فيرجى الاتصال بالمسؤول.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'prostor' (space) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'portal' in this context. 'Portal' typically refers to a gateway or online platform, not a physical space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pokud máte problémy s přístupem k tomuto portálu {{productName}}, obraťte se na správce.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'χώρο' (choro) which translates to 'space' or 'area' is not the best fit for 'portal'. A more accurate translation would use a word that conveys the idea of an online entry point or gateway.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εάν έχετε προβλήματα πρόσβασης σε αυτήν την πύλη {{productName}}, επικοινωνήστε με τον διαχειριστή.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "pääsyssä" (in accessing) is slightly awkward in this context. It's grammatically correct, but a more natural phrasing would be "tähän {{productName}} liittyen" (regarding this {{productName}}).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jos sinulla on ongelmia tähän {{productName}} liittyen, ole hyvä ja ota yhteyttä pääkäyttäjään.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'ole hyvä ja' is a bit formal. In a more user-friendly context, a simpler 'ota yhteyttä' would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jos sinulla on ongelmia tähän {{productName}} liittyen, ota yhteyttä pääkäyttäjään.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເບິ່ງແຍງ' (beung yaeng) in 'ຜູ້ເບິ່ງແຍງລະບົບ' (phu beung yaeng rabop) could be misinterpreted. While technically meaning 'administrator' or 'manager,' a more common and easily understood term in modern Lao might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'ຜູ້ປົກຄອງລະບົບ' (phu pok khong rabop) which translates to 'system administrator' or 'system manager' for clarity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'Ja, piekļūstot šai {{productName}}, rodas problēmas...' is slightly awkward in Latvian. While technically correct, it could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ja rodas problēmas, piekļūstot šai {{productName}}, lūdzu, sazinieties ar administratoru.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'Se está com problemas no acesso a este {{productName}}' is slightly informal for a professional context. A more formal alternative would improve the tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Se você está com problemas no acesso a este {{productName}}, por favor contacte o administrador.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term 'Portal' isn't directly translated. 'Priestoru' (space) is used instead. While not necessarily wrong, it might lose some of the original meaning of 'portal'. Consider if a more direct translation like 'bránu' (gate) or a more descriptive phrase would be better depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'bránu' (gate) or a more descriptive phrase depending on the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'prostor' (space) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'product' or 'portal' in this context. It implies a physical space rather than a digital portal or product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Če imate težave z dostopom do tega izdelka/portala {{productName}}, se obrnite na skrbnika.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian sentence structure could be improved for better flow and naturalness. 'Ако имате проблема са приступом овом {{productName}}-у' sounds a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ако имате проблема са приступом до овог {{productName}}-а, молимо контактирајте администратора.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of the hyphen with the product name feels slightly unnatural in this context. While technically correct, it's less common in conversational Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ако имате проблема са приступом до {{productName}}, молимо контактирајте администратора.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The hyphen in "{{productName}}-u" looks slightly awkward. While technically correct, a more natural flow might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ako imate problema sa pristupom ovom {{productName}}, molimo kontaktirajte administratora.
